channel.title: Workstation Problem with seven Dublicates from start now
channel.description:
Dear Adrelanos. Now i have a master Problem whith Dublicates on ARM. So, when i start Workstation i have seven Dublicates on Arm from Start now. Question is... Compromised?
Best Regards!
townsend

item.title: Workstation Problem with seven Dublicates from start now
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Correlation does not imply causation. (http://rationalwiki.org/wiki/Correlation_does_not_imply_causation) I don’t think these events are related. As per Arm FAQ (https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Controller#Arm_FAQ), it is well known what causes these “duplicates”.

If you have Arm running on the gateway and run the following command 11 times in the workstation.

Then you have 10 [more] duplicates.

Or if you prevent autostart of whonixcheck (https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Advanced_Security_Guide#Prevent_Autostart) (and reboot or stop whonixcheck using “sudo service whonixcheck stop”) then there won’t be any more duplicates.

In short: forget about using Arm for such purposes. It’s really not a tool made for that purpose.

Read full topic
item.source: Workstation Problem with seven Dublicates from start now

item.title: Workstation Problem with seven Dublicates from start now
item.dc:creator: townsend
item.description:
Another Try. When i start both, Gateway and Workstation, i have no visitors before. Now i have seven on arm. Every time when dublicates changed i have a visitor on the access Log. But i cant find this seven visitors on the Server access Log. Last Month i don’t have this. The Problem starts this Month. I’ll hope that you can understand my Problem now.

Patrick:

Sorry, but you need someone to translate this better, I didn’t understand anything.

Best Regards!

townsend

Read full topic

Compromized are - Seven Dublicates are now on Arm but on no LOG so… (Time Space on thee last fourteen Days, only for interessting)

item.title: Workstation Problem with seven Dublicates from start now
item.dc:creator: townsend
item.description:
Another i got skilled by URL. But not my Problem. But you can find all entrances of the hidden Space by time now. I wrote all these, but now when i have some visitors a time now, Dublicates chanched, so formyself is a copy from visitors and nothing else. Be ashamed of this. When i use my Server Log all was compromized at the same time… and please take a help when i am doing wrong.

[quote=“Patrick, post:2, topic:1023”]Arm is conceptually not a tool to find out about compromises. Skilled compromises go unnoticed.
See also:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Controller#Arm_FAQ[/quote]

townsend

Read full topic
